tooltips.classification: Describes the specific point of interest that is the subject of this report
tooltips.surroundings: Describes the atmosphere, terrain, weather, type of biome if identifiable (also check MobiGlass for External Atmospheric information and enter the details in the table under Cartography below)
tooltips.trade: Identifies what commodities/minerals/harvestables can be bought/sold/mined
tooltips.services: Identifies services and locations of Trade, Mining, Fine Payment, Rental, Weapon and Ship component terminals, Landing Pads (ship/ground vehicles), refuel/repair services etc.
tooltips.hostiles: Were hostile contacts encountered? Provides details.
tooltips.defenses: Identifies/describes any defenses present and indicates the number.
tooltips.occupants: Were there any occupants encountered? Provides details.
tooltips.lethalForce: Was lethal force used and what was the justification?
tooltips.remainingOccupants: Was the location cleared or do occupants remain? Are they hostile?
tooltips.other: Anything else of note that you think worthy of recording/mentioning
